name: HORIZON PHARMA USA, INC
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to orphan drugs and the value of innovative medicines.

Legislation to address opioids manufacturing and distribution
Pandemic and All-Hazards Preparedness Reauthorization Act (PAHPRA), vaccines and other various provisions.

H.R. 4710, 340B PAUSE Act, establishing a moratorium on the registration of new 340B hospitals and associated sites, and requiring reporting of program data.
H.R. 1625, Consolidated Appropriations Act
